## gemicons01.tga

**Total animations:** 6

### `A_ColdImage`

**Used in variants:** duxaUI, vert-blue

| Variant | File | X | Y | Width | Height |
|---------|------|--:|--:|------:|-------:|
| vert-blue | EQUI_PlayerWindow.xml | 168 | 120 | 24 | 24 |
| duxaUI | EQUI_PlayerWindow.xml | 144 | 0 | 24 | 24 |

**Example XML:**

```xml
<Ui2DAnimation item="A_ColdImage">
  <Frames>
    <Texture>gemicons01.tga</Texture>
    <Location>
      <X>168</X>
      <Y>120</Y>
    </Location>
    <Size>
      <CX>24</CX>
      <CY>24</CY>
    </Size>
  </Frames>
</Ui2DAnimation>
```

| QQ | EQUI_Animations.xml | 0 | 0 | 256 | 256 |
| thorne_drak | EQUI_Animations.xml | 0 | 0 | 256 | 256 |

**Example XML:**

```xml
<Ui2DAnimation item="A_SpellGems">
  <Grid>true</Grid>
  <CellWidth>24</CellWidth>
  <CellHeight>24</CellHeight>
  <Frames>
    <Texture>gemicons01.tga</Texture>
    <Location>
      <X>0</X>
      <Y>0</Y>
    </Location>
    <Size>
      <CX>256</CX>
      <CY>256</CY>
    </Size>
  </Frames>
</Ui2DAnimation>
```
